message.content: This question requires some basic understanding of how different materials react to heat. When a plastic toy is subjected to high levels of heat, it can melt and turn into a puddle, especially if left on a hotplate. Option (A) is incorrect because a steep mountain would not cause a plastic toy to turn into a puddle. Option (B) is not directly related to heat. Option (C) is unrelated and irrelevant to the question.
